description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply and delivery of 6 x 6 All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV). This procurement process is intended to result in the acquisition of thirty-two (32) ATVs.
full_summary:
### **All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Supply and Delivery**

**Tender Reference Number:** PW-23-01024884

**Publication Date:** 2023-02-07

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-23T14:00:00

**Tender Status:** Expiré

### Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the supply and delivery of thirty-two (32) 6 x 6 All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV).

The following trade agreements apply:
 * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

The delivery region includes Ontario, with the exception of the National Capital Region (NCR), and the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Request for Proposal Documents**

The Request for Proposal document in English is available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/cd112dca1ac4f029688bcd7be498661f/w6399-22lj77_b_request_for_proposal_english.pdf

The Request for Proposal document in French is available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/9281e35bc0874bb45dec322a1965635e/w6399-22lj77_b_request_for_proposal_french.pdf

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
* Name: Megan Buchanan
* Email: megan.buchanan@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-945-2929
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

Note: The government office will receive and evaluate bids until the tender closing date of February 23rd, 2023, at 14h00 HNE. Sellers should submit their proposal only through the contracting authority at the following address: Megan.Buchanan@forces.gc.ca. The contract shall fully comply with the technical specifications within the Request for Proposal solicitation document. ```bash
